requirements: Prerequisite: IBIO 531 or a similar course that provides a solid foundation in fundamental immunology. Enrollment limited to twenty-two; preference given to Immunobiology students taking the course as a degree requirement.
description:
This seminar covers principles of cancer immunology and the role of immunotherapy in oncology. Emphasis is placed on understanding mechanisms of disease and therapeutic interventions.
Prerequisite: IBIO 531 or a similar course that provides a solid foundation in fundamental immunology. Enrollment limited to twenty-two; preference given to Immunobiology students taking the course as a degree requirement.
